original_title: Curious Buddies: Look and Listen at the Park
overview: In CURIOUS BUDDIES: LOOK AND LISTEN AT THE PARK, babies ages 3-18 months will stimulate their senses with all the different things to see, hear and discover at the park. Joining the Curious Buddies, babies can play peek-a-boo, bounce a ball, and even smell the flowers in the park environment.
title: Curious Buddies: Look and Listen at the Park
